She swiftly shifts from sexy and sultry-bordering-on-masochistic to a haunting waltz backed by a looped angelic voice that belongs on GoldfrappÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Ã¢â‚¬ËœUtopiaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢, each cleverly opposing one another but combined to build what is often a kooky and colourful, occasionally macabre masterpiece.
